## IToolbox.setSelectedItem() method

Sets the selected item.

**Signature:**

```typescript
setSelectedItem(item: IToolboxItem | null): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  item | [IToolboxItem](./blockly.itoolboxitem.md) \| null | The toolbox item to select, or null to remove the current selection. |

**Returns:**

void
